name: Name
confirmMarkAll: Do you really want to mark all articles on this page as read?

log.fetchSuccess: Successfully fetched {count, plural, =1 {# article} other {# articles}}.
log.parseError: An error has occurred when parsing the XML feed.

settings.writeError: An error has occurred while writing the file.
settings.name: Settings

config.chatApiEndpointHint: OpenAI-compatible Chat API endpoint address. Must be a complete URL including protocol (https://) and full path (e.g., /v1/chat/completions)
config.chatApiKeyHint: API key for the Chat model
config.chatModelHint: The Chat model name to use, e.g., gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4, claude-3-opus, etc.
config.embeddingApiEndpointHint: OpenAI-compatible Embedding API endpoint address. Must be a complete URL including protocol (https://) and full path (e.g., /v1/embeddings)
config.embeddingApiKeyHint: API key for the Embedding model
config.embeddingModelHint: Model name for calculating article embeddings, e.g., text-embedding-ada-002, text-embedding-3-small, etc.
config.topkHint: Select the top K articles with highest similarity. Must be a positive integer, recommended value: 50-200
config.topkInvalid: TopK must be a positive integer greater than 0

menu.topicHint: Flexibly enter topics you care about, such as: progress in AI programming, latest developments in building materials industry, etc.
menu.classificationStandardHint: Guide AI to organize by category. For example, when the topic is progress in AI programming, you can fill in: classify by product name. When the topic is latest developments in building materials industry, you can fill in: classify by company. If left blank, all articles matching the topic will be displayed directly without classification.

messages.topicEmbeddingFailed: Failed to compute topic embedding, using full-text matching
messages.loadingEmbeddings: Loading existing article embeddings from database...
messages.allArticlesHaveEmbeddings: All articles already have embeddings, skipping computation
messages.needComputeEmbeddings: Need to compute embeddings for {count} articles...
messages.computeEmbeddingsFailed: Failed to compute embeddings, continuing with existing embeddings
messages.computingVectorsInParallel: Computing vectors in parallel... Completed {completed}/{total} batches ({processed}/{totalArticles})
messages.noArticlesForSimilarity: No articles available for similarity calculation
messages.similarityCalculated: Calculated similarity for {total} articles, selected top {selected} articles
messages.configChatApiEndpoint: Please configure Chat API Endpoint first (in settings)
messages.configChatApiKey: Please configure Chat API Key first (in settings)
messages.configModelName: Please configure model name first (in settings)
messages.llmFiltering: Using LLM to strictly filter {count} articles...
messages.chatApiEndpointInvalid: Chat API Endpoint must start with http:// or https://
messages.llmFilteringInParallel: Using LLM to filter in parallel... Completed {completed}/{total} batches ({processed}/{totalArticles})
messages.noRelatedArticlesAfterLLM: No related articles after LLM filtering
messages.llmFilteringCompleted: Completed LLM filtering, selected {refined} relevant articles from {total} articles
messages.analyzingAndClassifying: Analyzing content of {count} articles and classifying...
messages.classifyingInParallel: Classifying articles in parallel... Completed {completed}/{total} batches ({processed}/{totalArticles})
messages.classificationCompletedNoResults: Classification completed, but no valid classification results
messages.skipSimilarityCalculation: Article count ({count}) is less than or equal to TopK ({topk}), skipping similarity calculation
messages.intentRecognitionFailed: Intent recognition failed, using original topic
messages.topicIntentRecognitionFailed: Topic intent recognition failed, using original topic
messages.hydeGenerationFailed: Failed to generate hypothetical document, using original topic
messages.classificationIntentRecognitionFailed: Classification standard intent recognition failed, using original classification standard

results.noArticlesInTimeRange: No articles found in the selected time range
results.noArticlesInTimeRangeDescription: Please try selecting a different time range.
results.noArticlesMatchTopicDescription: Please try adjusting the topic, or select a different time range.

errors.selectTimeRange: Please select article publication time first
errors.noArticles: No articles found matching the criteria. Please try adjusting the time range{message}.
errors.topkInvalid: TopK must be a positive integer greater than 0
errors.queryFailed: Query failed, please try again later
errors.clusterFailed: Classification analysis failed, showing original article list
errors.configIncomplete: Please complete AI configuration first (configure in settings)

placeholder.title: AI Assistant - Article Consolidate
placeholder.description: Set options in the left menu bar, then click the "Consolidate" button to generate a summary
placeholder.topicHint: Flexibly enter topics you care about, such as: progress in AI programming, latest developments in building materials industry, etc.
placeholder.classificationStandardHint: Guide AI to organize by category. For example, when the topic is progress in AI programming, you can fill in: classify by product name. When the topic is latest developments in building materials industry, you can fill in: classify by company. If left blank, all articles matching the topic will be displayed directly without classification.

sources.serviceWarning: Sources imported or added here will not be synced with your service.
sources.serviceManaged: This source is managed by your service.
sources.errorAdd: An error has occured when adding the source.
sources.errorParse: An error has occurred when parsing the OPML file.
sources.errorParseHint: Please ensure that the file isn't corrupted and is encoded with UTF-8.
sources.errorImport: Error importing {count, plural, =1 {# source} other {# sources}}.
sources.name: Source name
sources.deleteWarning: The source and all saved articles will be removed.

groups.sourceHint: Drag and drop sources to reorder.
groups.groupHint: Double click on group to edit sources. Drag and drop to reorder.

rules.intro: Automatically mark articles or send notifications with regular expressions.
rules.title: Title
rules.creator: Author
rules.hint: Rules will be applied in order. Drag and drop to reorder.

service.intro: Sync across devices with RSS services.
service.overwriteWarning: Local sources will be deleted if they exist in the service.
service.groupsWarning: Groups aren't automatically synced with the service.
service.rateLimitWarning: To avoid rate limiting, you need to create your own API Key.
service.failureHint: Please check the service configuration or network status.

app.itemSize: Around {size} of local storage is occupied by articles
app.confirmImport: Do you really want to import data from the backup file? All current data will be wiped.
app.pacHint: For Socks proxies, it is recommended for PAC to return "SOCKS5" for proxy-side DNS. Turning off proxy requires restart.
